description: Hogtied is not for just any model, because it is the hardest bondage site on the net. Less then 52 girls a year ever make the update pages. Hundreds of girls apply each year, and we recruit hundreds more each year, but only a handful of girls ever make it onto our set. With all that said, welcome Whitney Stevens, a nineteen year old bombshell. Whitney is cute, has an amazing body and the most amazing natural breasts you will find anywhere. In this bonus update you get one scene with this spectacularly hot girl. Whitney gave it her best shot but had to stop after the first scene, because as we said before Hogtied is not for just any model. Remember when I said we recruit hundreds of girls a year? Out of those, normally only 5-10 accept the challenge. They look at our update page and decline. Whitney at least had the courage to try the shoot, which is more then I can say for many models.
title: Whitney Stevens
